channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.2.15
item.description:
About v10.2.15 Update

  • v10.2.15: Stability at reloading XML has been improved.
  • v10.2.14: Minor update.
  • v10.2.13: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.12: Minor update.
  • v10.2.11: Minor update.
  • v10.2.10: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.9: The following filters have been added.
    • modifierlocked_only
    • modifierlocked_not
    • modifierstuck_only
    • modifierstuck_not
  • v10.2.8: Minor update.
  • v10.2.7: Minor update.
  • v10.2.6: Minor update.
  • v10.2.5: Minor update.
  • v10.2.4: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.2.3: Fix dmg package.
  • v10.2.2: Sparkle has been updated.
  • v10.2.1: Prepared settings have been updated.
Karabiner Web Site
